title: Manage Shift Handover
description: A control room dispatcher finishing their shift must provide a complete and accurate handover to the incoming dispatcher.

tasks.description: Review the events of the last shift, including any production issues, safety incidents, or equipment status changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The outgoing dispatcher has a full summary of the shift's events.

tasks.description: Fill out the digital shift handover form, documenting the current status of the mine and any ongoing issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: The handover form is completed accurately.

tasks.description: Conduct a verbal handover with the incoming dispatcher, walking them through the report to ensure a full understanding.
tasks.expected_outcome: A successful handover is completed, ensuring continuity of operations.
